item.title: Tuesday Briefing
item.description: President Trump’s visit to the Gulf region.

item.title: Rodrigo Duterte Is Expected to Again Become Mayor of Davao City
item.description: Former President Rodrigo Duterte, who faces international court charges of crimes against humanity, appears to have been elected mayor of Davao City. ...

item.title: Starmer Pledges to Cut U.K. Immigration
item.description: Prime Minister Keir Starmer said his government was “taking back control of our borders,” weeks after a right-wing populist party, Reform U.K., made g...

item.title: Farmers Sued Over Deleted Climate Data. So the Government Will Put It Back.
item.description: The Agriculture Department pledged to restore online climate information that farmers said helped them do business, but which officials had deleted.

item.title: Palestinian Authority Lifting Ban on Al Jazeera in West Bank
item.description: The authority offered scant information about why it issued the ban in January, and it maintained that stance in announcing that it was rescinding it.
